<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>About | Architect & PhD Researcher</title>
<link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
body {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  background: #f7f9fc;
  color: #1a1a1a;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 40px 20px;
}

/* HERO SECTION */
.hero {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr;
  gap: 40px;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease-in;
}

.profile-img {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.hero-text h1 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.hero-text h2 {
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #555;
  margin-top: 0;
}

.hero-text p {
  line-height: 1.7;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* CARD GRID */
.section {
  margin-bottom: 60px;
}

.section-title {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 25px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

.cards {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr));
  gap: 25px;
}

.card {
  background: white;
  padding: 25px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.card i {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  color: #4a6cf7;
}

.card h3 {
  margin-top: 0;
}

/* CONTACT BUTTONS */
.buttons a {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 15px;
  padding: 10px 18px;
  border-radius: 30px;
  background: #4a6cf7;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
}

.buttons a:hover {
  background: #2f4ed8;
}

/* ANIMATIONS */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px);} 
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0);} 
}

@media(max-width: 768px) {
  .hero {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    text-align: center;
  }
}
</style>
</head>

<body>
<div class="container">

  <!-- HERO -->
  <div class="hero">
    <img src="assets/images/7077.png" alt="Profile Photo" class="profile-img">
    <div class="hero-text">
      <h1>Your Name</h1>
      <h2>Architect | PhD Researcher</h2>
      <p>
        Architect and PhD researcher exploring thermal resilience, urban heat stress, and climate-responsive design in rapidly urbanising regions. My work bridges computational tools, environmental performance, and sustainable architecture to address the growing challenges of extreme heat in African cities.
      </p>
      <div class="buttons">
        <a href="assets/documents/Kumary_CV_2024.pdf"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Academic CV</a>
        <a href="assets/documents/Kumary_Resume.pdf"><i class="fa fa-briefcase"></i> Resume</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- RESEARCH -->
  <div class="section">
    <div class="section-title"><i class="fa fa-microscope"></i> Research Focus</div>
    <div class="card">
      <p>
        My doctoral research investigates how globalised facade systems and building envelope materials affect thermal resilience under present and projected climate conditions. I analyse long-term climate scenarios, urban density, informality, and green infrastructure to understand vulnerability to extreme heat â€” particularly in cities such as Nairobi.
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- EDUCATION -->
  <div class="section">
    <div class="section-title"><i class="fa fa-graduation-cap"></i> Education</div>
    <div class="cards">
      <div class="card">
        <h3>University of Cambridge</h3>
        <p>PhD Architecture (Ongoing)<br>Master of Architecture & Urban Studies, 2024</p>
      </div>
      <div class="card">
        <h3>University of Nairobi</h3>
        <p>Bachelor of Architecture, 2019<br>Bachelor of Architectural Studies, 2017</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- SKILLS -->
  <div class="section">
    <div class="section-title"><i class="fa fa-code"></i> Technical Skills</div>
    <div class="cards">
      <div class="card">
        <h3>Design</h3>
        <p>Archicad, SketchUp, AutoCAD, Lumion, Rhinoceros, InDesign</p>
      </div>
      <div class="card">
        <h3>Computational & GIS</h3>
        <p>QGIS, Python, R, Google Earth Engine</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- TEACHING -->
  <div class="section">
    <div class="section-title"><i class="fa fa-chalkboard-teacher"></i> Teaching & Mentoring</div>
    <div class="card">
      <p>
        I design and deliver courses in architecture fundamentals and sustainability-driven design thinking, mentoring emerging designers in integrating environmental performance into architectural practice.
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>

</div>
</body>
</html>
